description:
While at Lorelei, Souma overhears two soldiers arguing about whether to side with or against the new king. Hakuya reviews the political situation concerning the neighboring lands with the king. Souma and Liscia discuss the nature of their engagement. 
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Chisha wa Toki ni Somuite Ri o Sutezu
Ein weiser Mann ist nur dann ungehorsam, wenn seine Interessen gewahrt bleiben
Le sage se rebelle parfois, mais sait toujours où est son intérêt
The Wise Man Never Forsaketh an Advantage
智者は時にそむいて利を捨てず
